headline: Student at Panther Creek High School
desc: I started my freshman year of high school at Panther Creek. Some classes I took include Python Programming I and Microsoft Excel.

headline: Co-Founded Panther Creek Aviation Club
desc: During fall of my sophomore year, I started the Panther Creek Aviation Club, with a mission of guiding fellow students into a career in aviation.
alt: Panther Creek High Aviation Club Logo

headline: Team Member at Chick-fil-A
desc: My first job during my sophomore year was at Chick-Fil-A. I made sandwiches, nuggets, fries, cookies, brownies. Additionally, I trained new team members about Chick-Fil-A's policies.

headline: Business Development Intern at Oppti
desc: My first internship! Working with Oppti has both helped my interpersonal and communication skills. I've learned both marketing and business skills during this. I used to be terrified of speaking up in meetings, and this internship has helped me work better with others, and be more outgoing!

headline: Intern at The Coding Foundation
desc: The Coding Foundation provided me with the opportunity to start my first Computer Science internship. I created a curriculum taught to 100+ students about the fundamentals of JavaScript.

headline: Intern at UNC-CH RENCI
desc: Summer 2021 intern on University of North Carolina Renaissance Computing Institute's Helping to End Addiction Long-term Team (HEAL).

headline: Qoom Creator
desc: Created MaskUp, a web app that features live mask detection, data visualizations, and Covid-19 symptom tracking.

headline: NC School of Science and Math
desc: I'm currently a junior at NCSSM, a public residential high school. I plan on delving deeper into the world of computer science during time at this school.

headline: Student Developer at Bit Project
desc: I'm currently working with Bit Project, a non-profit organization, make technical education more accessible to all students.
